segments.text: Good morning . My name's Jason Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , good morning , Mr . Smith . Nice to meet you . I'm Peter Anderson from Personnel . Do sit down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , have you brought your curriculum vitae with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my CV . Yes , here it s . There are three copies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you brought your certificates as well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven't . I'm awfully sorry . Can I send them to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that'll be all right . Well , please tell me about your working experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't been involved in international business , so I don't have any experiences , but I am diligent and I learn very fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so do you think you can make yourself easily understood in English ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , in most circumstances.Are you available for business travel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am young , and unmarried . It's no problem for me to travel frequently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . You are good . Hope to see you next time . I'll call you if you get picked for next test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I'm looking forward to your call .
segments.speaker: S2
